thread.title: Otis Technology to Sponsor Trijicon Shooting Challenge
thread.title_full: Otis Technology to Sponsor Trijicon Shooting Challenge

author: Justin Stakes
title: Otis Technology to Sponsor Trijicon Shooting Challenge
text:
Otis Technology to Sponsor Trijicon Shooting Challenge Posted on 
Tracy & Lanny Barnes to Compete on Behalf of Otis Trijicon Shooting Challenge Otis Technology 
Lyons Falls, NY -( AmmoLand.com )- Otis Technology is pleased to announce its participation as the official gun cleaning sponsor of the Trijicon Shooting Challenge. 
The match takes place October 21-24, 2015 at Rockcastle Shooting Center in Park City, KY. Known previously as the Trijicon World Shooting Championship, it is the ultimate challenge of competitive shooting ability and will assemble junior and adult shooters from various organized shooting sports worldwide. 
The match will disperse over $100,000 in cash prizes including a first place prize of $50,000. In this unique match, all guns and ammunition will be provided to the competitors. Match segments will utilize rifles, pistol, and shotguns over the course of three days. 
“We’re very excited to sponsor this event. While we’ve sponsored matches before, this will be our first major sponsorship and we look forward to interacting with the competitors,” states Greg Essenlohr, Government Sales Manager for Otis Technology. 
“Trijicon is pleased to announce that Otis Technology as a valued partner of the 2015 Trijicon Shooting Challenge,” said Jeff Mosher, Director of Domestic Business Development. He continues, “Otis manufactures superior gun cleaning systems and accessories and we are very happy that they have decided to support our match.” 
Tracy & Lanny Barnes, former Olympic Biathletes, will be competing in the match on behalf of Otis. The Barnes twins have been a part of the Otis prostaff team for over ten years and since their retirement from Olympic competition, they are now focused on firearms training through their facility, T.O.P Institute ( www.topshootinginstitute.com ), and competing in 3-gun matches. 
For more information on the Trijicon Shooting Challenge, visit www.trijiconshootingchallenge.com . 
About Otis Technology: 
Otis Technology is known for manufacturing the most advanced gun cleaning systems available. The superior Breech-to-Muzzle design combined with unmatched quality has positioned Otis as the gun care system of choice with the US Military. Otis Technology is SMART GUN CARE. 
For more information, visit: www.OtisTec.com .
